description: Innocentius is the representative of K.P.A.Italia, and Pope-President of the top school, K.P.A. Scuola; holds a lot of influence around the whole world. Owner of the Armor of Deadly Sins, Steisos Porneia (Lust). Highly ambitious; intends to expand his power and influence under the pretext of recreating history.
name: Innocentius
